p_1: Using Flash, I first began by tracing out the typography component on a 24fps composition. I animated over 2s, using 3 distinct frames and cycling through them. Following the typography, I rendered out footage from My Hero Academia in After Effects so that it was compatible in Flash. Importing it into Flash, I traced over the frames over 2s so that the animation would sync with the text. I made sure to keep the timing as precise as possible over a 12fps composition. I then exported it to After Effects as a separate typography and animation .swf so as to edit the layers separately. Adding in a paper background animation, I rendered the composition with a couple timing and color tweaks.
